definitions.definition: To conceal or infiltrate through the use of stealth .
To subject (someone) to stealthing ( sexual intercourse without a condom through deception , for example removing the condom mid-act).

main_definition: ( especially military , computing ) To conceal or infiltrate through the use of stealth .
secondary_definitions: ( slang , transitive ) To subject (someone) to stealthing ( sexual intercourse without a condom through deception , for example removing the condom mid-act).
